item.title: Videographer Needed for GC Video Series - Upwork
item.description:
Project Overview:
Guidance College (GC), an Islamic institution of higher learning, is seeking a professional videographer to produce a video series promoting our academic programs. This project aims to significantly boost the visibility and awareness of our college, showcasing the unique educational opportunities available. The videos will be tailored for seamless integration across various platforms including social media, websites, and direct digital distribution. The desired presentation style is professional, energetic, and smoothly paced.

Project Details:

•Preproduction Planning: Collaborative meetings via Zoom, phone calls, and emails to outline video objectives and script alignment with GC’s goals.
•Preproduction Tasks: Scriptwriting, video outlining, graphic design for titles and informational slides, background sound/music selection, and storyboard creation.
•Production: Travel to Houston, Texas, and possibly Dallas, for on-location shoots.
•Video Formats: Videos should be produced in 30-second and 60-second versions, with some extended cuts lasting 2-3 minutes.

Required Skills and Equipment:
•Proven expertise in video production, particularly in educational or promotional video creation.
•Ability to handle all aspects of video production, from preproduction planning to shooting and post-production.
•Access to professional-grade video production equipment.

Deliverables:
•A series of (6-10) concise, high-quality videos in multiple formats for varied platform use.
•All videos should align with the branding and promotional goals of Guidance College.
Location: On-site production at two locations in Houston and possibly Dallas, Texas.

Proposal Requirements:
•Detailed proposal outlining your approach to the project.
•Total cost estimation, including travel expenses.
•Portfolio of previous work, especially in similar projects.

How to Apply:
Please submit your proposal directly through this Upwork listing. Include any relevant experience, particularly in the field of educational or promotional videography, and outline your project plan and budget.


Budget: $5,000
Posted On: June 19, 2024 05:57 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Videography, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Videography, Video Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
